title: Forecast: Much needed rain expected today.
content:
Much needed rain is expected for the Pine Belt today which should keep our highs in the lower to mid 80s.

Clearing skies tonight with lows in the lower 60s.

Sunny and dry weather returns for Tuesday with highs around 90.

See the latest weather updates right now on your phone through our free weather app available on Android at this link: http://tinyurl.com/74xh8dd and on phone at this link: http://tinyurl.com/blknf2y or visit the WDAM web site any time on a computer at this link: www.wdam.com/weather
